item.title: [cmr] Into the Roil
item.description:
Instant

Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)

Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.

item.title: [cmr] Sphinx of Uthuun
item.description:
Creature — Sphinx

Flying

When Sphinx of Uthuun enters the battlefield, reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

item.title: [cmr] Slinn Voda, the Rising Deep
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Leviathan

Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)

When Slinn Voda, the Rising Deep enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return all creatures to their owners' hands except for Merfolk, Krakens, Leviathans, Octopuses, and Serpents.

item.title: [cmr] Shipbreaker Kraken
item.description:
Creature — Kraken

{6}{U}{U}: Monstrosity 4. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put four +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

When Shipbreaker Kraken becomes monstrous, tap up to four target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps for as long as you control Shipbreaker Kraken.

item.title: [cmr] Scourge of Fleets
item.description:
Creature — Kraken

When Scourge of Fleets enters the battlefield, return each creature your opponents control with toughness X or less to its owner's hand, where X is the number of Islands you control.

item.title: [cmr] Peel from Reality
item.description:
Instant

Return target creature you control and target creature you don't control to their owners' hands.

item.title: [cmr] Whelming Wave
item.description:
Sorcery

Return all creatures to their owners' hands except for Krakens, Leviathans, Octopuses, and Serpents.

item.title: [cmr] Tromokratis
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Kraken

Tromokratis has hexproof unless it's attacking or blocking.

Tromokratis can't be blocked unless all creatures defending player controls block it. (If any creature that player controls doesn't block this creature, it can't be blocked.)

item.title: [cmr] Stormtide Leviathan
item.description:
Creature — Leviathan

Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

All lands are Islands in addition to their other types.

Creatures without flying or islandwalk can't attack.

item.title: [cmr] Body of Knowledge
item.description:
Creature — Avatar

Body of Knowledge's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.

You have no maximum hand size.

Whenever Body of Knowledge is dealt damage, draw that many cards.

item.title: [cmr] Miara, Thorn of the Glade
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Scout

Whenever Miara, Thorn of the Glade or another Elf you control dies, you may pay {1} and 1 life. If you do, draw a card.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

item.title: [cmr] Viscera Seer
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Wizard

Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

item.title: [cmr] Fleshbag Marauder
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Warrior

When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yc_clSPaPyA

item.title: [cmr] Blazing Sunsteel
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +1/+0 for each opponent you have.

Whenever equipped creature is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to any target.

Equip {4}

item.title: [cmr] Expedite
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

Draw a card.

item.title: [cmr] Dualcaster Mage
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

Flash

When Dualcaster Mage enters the battlefield, copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

item.title: [cmr] Comet Storm
item.description:
Instant

Multikicker {1} (You may pay an additional {1} any number of times as you cast this spell.)

Choose any target, then choose another target for each time this spell was kicked. Comet Storm deals X damage to each of them.

item.title: [cmr] Relentless Assault
item.description:
Sorcery

Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

item.title: [cmr] Jaya's Immolating Inferno
item.description:
Legendary Sorcery

(You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)

Jaya's Immolating Inferno deals X damage to each of up to three targets.

item.title: [cmr] Fists of Flame
item.description:
Instant

Draw a card. Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +1/+0 for each card you've drawn this turn.

item.title: [cmr] Word of Seizing
item.description:
Instant

Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)

Untap target permanent and gain control of it until end of turn. It gains haste until end of turn.

item.title: [cmr] Wild Ricochet
item.description:
Instant

You may choose new targets for target instant or sorcery spell. Then copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

item.title: [cmr] Volcanic Fallout
item.description:
Instant

This spell can't be countered.

Volcanic Fallout deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

item.title: [cmr] Court of Ire
item.description:
Enchantment

When Court of Ire enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.

At the beginning of your upkeep, Court of Ire deals 2 damage to any target. If you're the monarch, it deals 7 damage to that player or permanent instead.

item.title: [cmr] Stumpsquall Hydra
item.description:
Creature — Hydra

When Stumpsquall Hydra enters the battlefield, distribute X +1/+1 counters among it and any number of commanders.

item.title: [cmr] Beast Within
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

item.title: [cmr] Avenger of Zendikar
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

When Avenger of Zendikar enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token for each land you control.

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each Plant creature you control.

item.title: [cmr] Khalni Heart Expedition
item.description:
Enchantment

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Khalni Heart Expedition.

Remove three quest counters from Khalni Heart Expedition and sacrifice it: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [cmr] Harmonize
item.description:
Sorcery

Draw three cards.

item.title: [cmr] Explore
item.description:
Sorcery

You may play an additional land this turn.

Draw a card.

item.title: [cmr] Eternal Witness
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [cmr] Cultivate
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

item.title: [cmr] Rampant Growth
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

item.title: [cmr] Rampaging Baloths
item.description:
Creature — Beast

Trample

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.

item.title: [cmr] Molimo, Maro-Sorcerer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elemental

Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

Molimo, Maro-Sorcerer's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.

item.title: [cmr] Sporemound
item.description:
Creature — Fungus

Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

item.title: [cmr] Search for Tomorrow
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

Suspend 2—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

item.title: [cmr] Retreat to Kazandu
item.description:
Enchantment

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —

• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

• You gain 2 life.

item.title: [cmr] Ramunap Excavator
item.description:
Creature — Naga Cleric

You may play lands from your graveyard.

item.title: [cmr] Verdant Sun's Avatar
item.description:
Creature — Dinosaur Avatar

Whenever Verdant Sun's Avatar or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

item.title: [cmr] Terastodon
item.description:
Creature — Elephant

When Terastodon enters the battlefield, you may destroy up to three target noncreature permanents. For each permanent put into a graveyard this way, its controller creates a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

item.title: [cmr] Yavimaya Elder
item.description:
Creature — Human Druid

When Yavimaya Elder dies, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

{2}, Sacrifice Yavimaya Elder: Draw a card.

item.title: [cmr] Wickerbough Elder
item.description:
Creature — Treefolk Shaman

Wickerbough Elder enters the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.

{G}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from Wickerbough Elder: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [cmr] Wyleth, Soul of Steel
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

Trample

Whenever Wyleth, Soul of Steel attacks, draw a card for each Aura and Equipment attached to it.

item.title: [cmr] Aesi, Tyrant of Gyre Strait
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Serpent

You may play an additional land on each of your turns.

Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.

item.title: [cmr] Growth Spiral
item.description:
Instant

Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

item.title: [cmr] Fathom Mage
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

Whenever a +1/+1 counter is put on Fathom Mage, you may draw a card.

item.title: [cmr] Deflecting Palm
item.description:
Instant

The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. If damage is prevented this way, Deflecting Palm deals that much damage to that source's controller.

item.title: [cmr] Simic Charm
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

• Permanents you control gain hexproof until end of turn.

• Return target creature to its owner's hand.

item.title: [cmr] Sharktocrab
item.description:
Creature — Shark Octopus Crab

{2}{G}{U}: Adapt 1. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Sharktocrab, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
